clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Gallbladder shows hyperechoic, no stones or wall thickening.
Right kidney demonstrates hyperechoic, no hydronephrosis.
Thyroid gland shows enlarged echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Testes are hyperechoic with normal vascularity.
Soft tissue region demonstrates ill-defined without fluid collection.
